title: The SSG skin?
body:
I wanted to know where the new SSG skins are??
I understand you are working on the BE issue but I was wondering if I can get an update on the SSG skins?

II keep checking the shop and I dont see them.

replies.body: OP thinks they can make 5 new skins in 2 weeks, lmao.
They only just started them, there's no way we're getting them right now, wait till July onwards, that's when we usually get worlds skins

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=hxKkrQ43,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-13T00:00:01.662+0000)
>
> They only just started them, there's no way we're getting them right now, wait till July onwards, that's when we usually get worlds skins

Sadface. I never really followed worlds until this year.
So I didn't know how long it would take. Thank you.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
didn't come out yet, you should wait till 2018oct]
